original: LARSSON, Erik Lambert, Direktör, Kristinehamn, f Malung, Kopparb l, 16/5 89 av ing L A L o Anna Eriksson, gm Sigrid SjövalL Kristineh allm lärov, öbr tekn elem.sk. Ing v L A Larssons gjut & mek verkst fr 09, inneh sed. 30 av denna t Albin Motor, KommB L A Larsson, ombild fma. Styr.led Sv hdls-bkns avd.kont. Stdsflm sed. 35 samt led dräts.kamm.
translated: LARSSON, Erik Lambert, Director, Kristinehamn, b. Malung, Kopparbergs län, 16/5 89, son of engineer L. A. L and Anna Eriksson, married to Sigrid Sjövall. Attended Kristinehamn public school and technical elementary school. Started working in L. A. Larsson's foundry and mechanical workshop in 1909, became the owner in 1930 after the company was renamed Albin Motor. Member of the Kristinehamn Municipal Board and the board of directors for the Swedish Trade Bank's departmental office from 1935. Also served as a member of the financial committee.
